body:
@mythmon Any idea why Circle is failing? Here's the very last bit of the error log:

```
Error removing intermediate container 0323957910e5: nosuchcontainer: No such container: 0323957910e51b1f53f948091702b1038b7a358ce550a254a566e9d6434be20a
Step 6 : COPY . /app
 ---> 64a76754647d
Error removing intermediate container 0323957910e5: nosuchcontainer: No such container: 0323957910e51b1f53f948091702b1038b7a358ce550a254a566e9d6434be20a
Successfully built 64a76754647d
~/normandy

./ci/circleci/bin/runner.sh dependencies returned exit code 1

Action failed: ./ci/circleci/bin/runner.sh dependencies
```
